data.text: Yaye, unune malit un joma loso chike ma ok nikare,
utamo joma odhier e adieragi
To initim angʼo chiengʼ ngʼado bura,
Onge gima nodongʼ makmana kirni e nyim joma otwe
Mano kaka unune malit un jo-Asuria,
En ema aore, mondo odhi oked gi oganda mokia Nyasaye,
To mae ok e gima oparo timo to bende ma ok e gima ni e pache;
Openjo niya, Donge jotenda duto gin ruodhi?
Donge Kalno osechalo gi Karkemish?
Mana kaka asemako pinyruodhi mag nyiseche manono,
Donge onego atimne Jerusalem kod nyisechene manono
Ka Ruoth Nyasaye osetieko tijene duto mag kumo Got Sayun gi jo-Jerusalem, enowach niya, “Abiro kumo ruodh Asuria nikech timbene mohero mag sunga gi ngʼayi.
Nikech owacho niya,
Mana kaka ngʼato kawo tongʼ e od winyo,
To bende le disungre ne ngʼat matongʼo kode,
Kuom mano, Ruoth Nyasaye ma en Jehova Nyasaye Maratego,
Ler mar Israel nolokre mach,
Ber mar bungene kod puothene momewo,
Kendo yiende mag bungene
Chiengʼno jo-Israel manok,
Nyikwa Jakobo manok mane odongʼ
Yaye jo-Israel kata obedo ni ungʼeny,
Ruoth Nyasaye, ma en Jehova Nyasaye Maratego,
Kuom mano, ma e gima Ruoth Nyasaye ma en Jehova Nyasaye Maratego wacho:
Machiegnini mirimba kodu biro rumo
Jehova Nyasaye Maratego nochwadgi gi del,
E kindeno tingʼ mapek mane joga nigo
Ne aneno ka gidonjo Ayath,
Kane giwuotho ka gikalo negiwacho niya,
Yaye, nyi Galim, gouru nduru!
Jo-Madmena ringo;
Kawuono gibiro bworo kambigi Nob;
Neuru Ruoth Nyasaye ma en Jehova Nyasaye Maratego,
Obiro ngʼado bunge moyugno kod le;
